content: cm ending after k2tog k1 2 sts decrease d working a rs row next row ws decrease p1 p2tog work in patt to 3 sts rem ssp p1 2 sts decrease d body change to larger ndls repeat prev 2 row 5 6 8 7 8 6 10 11 times more 26 26 26 30 32 32 36 36 sts set up for body next row ws p1 edge st work in st st p1 k1 5 6 bobble all sts loosely in pattern 8 10 11 12 15 16 times pm k1 p4 k4 p4 pm k3 p4 k7 p2 m1p-r p1 k7 p4 k3 pm p4 k4 p4 k1 pm p1 right front k1 5 6 8 10 11 12 15 16 times p1 edge st work in st hem st 80 84 92 100 104 108 120 124 sts using smaller ndl co 52 52 54 60 62 64 70 72 sts begin working from charts begin ribbing row 1 rs k1 edge st work row 1 of moss chart a row 1 rs sl 1 wyif *k1 p1 repeat from * to 1 st rem k1 over 10 12 16 20 22 24 30 32 sts to m sl m work row row 2 ws *p1 k1 repeat from * to 2 sts rem p2 1 of panel chart a over 13 sts sl m work row 1 of center chart over 32 sts sl m work row 1 of panel chart b over repeat row 1 2 until hem meas 3 7 5 cm ending after 13 sts sl m work row 1 of moss chart b over 10 12 16 working a rs row 20 22 24 30 32 sts k1 edge st body notes work the first and last stitches of every row in stockinette change to larger ndl and slip markers as you come to them for moss charts a and set up for body b and panel charts a and b work row 2 4 once then repeat next row ws p1 side edge st work in st st k1 p1 row 1 4 thereafter for center chart work row 2 38 once k1 1 1 2 5 6 7 10 11 time s pm k1 p4 pm k3 p4 then repeat row 1 38 thereafter k7 p4 k7 p4 k3 pm p4 k1 pm p1 k1 2 times p2 continue as established until back meas 15 38 cm from begin working from charts co edge for all sizes ending after working a ws row you row 1 rs sl 1 wyif k1 p1 2 times k1 sl m work row may wish to make a note of the last patt row completed so 1 of cross chart a over 5 sts sl m work row 1 of center you can work the fronts to match later chart over 32 sts sl m work row 1 of cross chart b over 5 sts sl m work row 1 of moss chart
